Text:
adel_dz

i noticed you comment as soon as these were released on the 11th and 16th. Do you have some way of getting an alert when this is released? Can you share how to get an alert when a torrent is released? Thanks!

On SuprBay under the Members Discussions/ Mutual Help Section there is a subsection that you can post about your ebook releases. Seems like quite a bit of extra work. I rarely use Suprbay, so it's especially a pain. I will give it some thought though.
